about_the_game:
Start your journey as a potion making hopeful and fumble your way through the awkward stages of a new hobby. Slowly but surely you will learn how to use the tools at your disposal, such as the knife, mortar and pestle, cooking grid and more. Gain knowledge of bizarre ingredients and accumulate recipes for outlandish potions. Submit the potions to your customers orders or consume them to gain the powers within. Mastery can only be achieved through practice, resilience and problem solving. Once mastery is achieved, face the toughest challenges an alchemist can face.

Key Features
  • Progress from beginner to master across 25 campaign levels.
  • Solve puzzles, explore oddities and face challenges across 20+ bonus levels. Mazes, puzzles, time trials and more stand in your path.
  • Shatter the bounds of reality and explore endlessly in Imagination Mode.
  • Fill over 50 pages in your alchemist book with discoveries and new potion recipes.
  • Create a vast array of potions from basic potions like Strength, Health, Mana or Heat. To the bizarre potions like the Potion of Sniffless Swiftness, Teleportation, Sharp Hands, or Levitation.

short_description: Potion Problem is a whimsical potion making puzzler about discovery, problem solving and potions! Create potions and fulfill orders, prepare bizarre ingredients and learn the deepest secrets of the alchemist's world.
